original_title: On the Road with The Wiggles
overview: On the Road with The Wiggles is a Wiggles DVD released on August 10, 2008 from the Sunday Telegraph newspaper.  Live in Concert Songs:  OntheRoadWiththeWiggles-BackCover  Hot Potato  Fruit Salad  Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star  English Country Garden  Two Fine Gentlemen  Wake Up Jeff! (featuring Jimmy Barnes)  Toot Toot, Chugga Chugga, Big Red Car  Film Clips:  Dr. Knickerbocker  The Shimmie Shake  Baa, Baa, Black Sheep  One, Two, Three, Four, Five  Vegetable Soup  I Love it When it Rains  Black Velvet Band
title: On the Road with The Wiggles
